name: The Sex Game: Hot Dice!
description:
The Sex Game: Hot Dice! - Is a game created for the for the amusement of adults!
The game contains several erotic dices, including the option to create your own pair of dice.
It's already includes 16 pairs of dices with the most diverse actions to increase your enjoyment and pleasure with your partner!
Spice up your relationship!
Enjoy and have fun!
